title: Patrick McLoughlin – 2016 Speech on the Rail Supply Group
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Patrick McLoughlin, the Secretary of State for Transport, at The Manufacturing Technology Centre, Ansty Park, Coventry on 1 February 2016.
